title: Populate AD DS
description: Creates custom organizational units for ten business functional units, adds 1,000 ficticious user names (100 to each business unit OU), creates a security group in each OU that includes all members of that OU, and then changes their UPN suffix to the suffix provided. Fictitious names courtesy of fakenamegenerator.com and licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 United States License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/us/

upnSuffix.description: OPTIONAL: Changes the UPN suffix and email address properties to the specified value for all Active Directory user account objects. Leave blank to skip.
